commit.message:
Auto merge of #50713 - killercup:update-rustfix, r=alexcrichton

Update rustfix

- Update compiletest to use rustfix 0.3.1

r? @Manishearth

files.patch:
@@ -402,7 +402,7 @@ dependencies = [
